name: SchemaOnRead
body: The SchemaOnRead R package provides schema-on-read tools including a single function call (e.g., schemaOnRead(

)) that reads text (TXT), comma separated value (CSV), raster image (BMP, PNG, GIF, TIFF, and JPG), R data (RDS), HDF5, NetCDF, spreadsheet (XLS, XLSX, ODS, and DIF), Weka Attribute-Relation File Format (ARFF), Epi Info (REC), SPSS (SAV), Systat (SYS), and Stata (DTA) files. It also recursively reads folders (e.g., schemaOnRead(
)), returning a nested list of the contained elements.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
